experience.title: Senior Business Development Manager
experience.description: Bond Interiors was established in the United Arab Emirates, 1986 and has grown to be one of the largest fit-out companies in the region. With over 2,500 employees and 550,000 square feet of sustainable purpose-built production facilities; we are dedicated to the highest quality in interior contracting, furniture manufacturing and joinery works. We operate in 8 different international locations from Dubai, Abu Dhabi, Sharjah, Riyadh, Philippines, India, China and Italy.
experience.description_html: Bond Interiors was established in the United Arab Emirates, 1986 and has grown to be one of the largest fit-out companies in the region. With over 2,500 employees and 550,000 square feet of sustainable purpose-built production facilities; we are dedicated to the highest quality in interior contracting, furniture manufacturing and joinery works. We operate in 8 different international locations from Dubai, Abu Dhabi, Sharjah, Riyadh, Philippines, India, China and Italy. <!---->

experience.title: Senior Manager Business Development- Retail Manufacturing
experience.description: ✯ Pioneered the establishment of the Luxury Retail division, positioning Havelock One as the preferred partner for major international premium & Luxury retailers, PMC’s, architects, and designers. ✯ Successfully secured prestigious premium retail and travel retail projects, solidifying the company's reputation as a leader in the industry.✯ Developed and executed a comprehensive market analysis strategy, resulting in a profound understanding of market dynamics, customer behavior, and competitive landscape. ✯ Strategically employed direct and indirect approaches to penetrate premium and luxury segment brands & F&B, driving market expansion for Havelock One.✯ Cultivated partnerships with renowned global brands.✯ Achieved a remarkable growth trajectory by scaling the bespoke furniture manufacturing business from $200K to $6 million annually within a span of 5 years, significantly boosting company revenue and market share.✯ Fostered strategic alliances with premium consultants resulting in secured Fit Out projects from esteemed clients generating $4 million in annual revenue.✯ Spearheaded the implementation of cutting-edge software solutions including ARIBA for Mega projects and BNC for lead generation, streamlining operations and optimizing workflow efficiency across the organization.
experience.description_html: ✯ Pioneered the establishment of the Luxury Retail division, positioning Havelock One as the preferred partner for major international premium & Luxury retailers, PMC’s, architects, and designers. ✯ Successfully secured prestigious premium retail and travel retail projects, solidifying the company's reputation as a leader in the industry.✯ Developed and executed a comprehensive market analysis strategy, resulting in a profound understanding of market dynamics, customer behavior, and competitive landscape. ✯ Strategically employed direct and indirect approaches to penetrate premium and luxury segment brands & F&B, driving market expansion for Havelock One.✯ Cultivated partnerships with renowned global brands.✯ Achieved a remarkable growth trajectory by scaling the bespoke furniture manufacturing business from $200K to $6 million annually within a span of 5 years, significantly boosting company revenue and market share.✯ Fostered strategic alliances with premium consultants resulting in secured Fit Out projects from esteemed clients generating $4 million in annual revenue.✯ Spearheaded the implementation of cutting-edge software solutions including ARIBA for Mega projects and BNC for lead generation, streamlining operations and optimizing workflow efficiency across the organization.

experience.title: Sales Director
experience.description: ✯ Advanced from a Key Account Manager to the role of Sales Director, showcasing exceptional leadership and sales expertise, resulting in recognition and career progression within the organization.✯ Achieved significant revenue growth by securing key clients, leading to a substantial increase in company revenue.✯ Successfully established and nurtured business relationships, contributing to an annual business worth $3 million. ✯ Cultivated strategic partnerships with industry leaders resulting in lucrative opportunities and business growth for the organization.✯ Fostered cross-functional collaboration within internal teams to develop and deliver tailored solutions that consistently exceeded client expectations, leading to enhanced client loyalty and positive feedback.✯ Diversified the company’s clientele by proactively engaging architects, designers, and consultants, resulting in a significant expansion of the customer base.✯ Successfully generated leads and fulfilled their requirements, driving business growth and revenue.
experience.description_html: ✯ Advanced from a Key Account Manager to the role of Sales Director, showcasing exceptional leadership and sales expertise, resulting in recognition and career progression within the organization.✯ Achieved significant revenue growth by securing key clients, leading to a substantial increase in company revenue.✯ Successfully established and nurtured business relationships, contributing to an annual business worth $3 million. ✯ Cultivated strategic partnerships with industry leaders resulting in lucrative opportunities and business growth for the organization.✯ Fostered cross-functional collaboration within internal teams to develop and deliver tailored solutions that consistently exceeded client expectations, leading to enhanced client loyalty and positive feedback.✯ Diversified the company’s clientele by proactively engaging architects, designers, and consultants, resulting in a significant expansion of the customer base.✯ Successfully generated leads and fulfilled their requirements, driving business growth and revenue.

experience.title: Sales Manager- MENA Region.
experience.description: ✯ Successfully penetrated and expanded markets in the UAE, Kuwait, Qatar, India, and Pakistan, resulting in substantial business growth and market share acquisition in these regions.✯ Exceeded budget forecasts for three consecutive years, achieving exceptional results such as securing the largest order of 1.2 MIO Euro for 3 Modell’s department stores in Dubai and the rollout for Binsina Pharmacy, contributing to significant revenue growth and profitability.✯ Secured rollout plans for prominent retail stores and established partnerships with key retailers driving business expansion and market presence.✯ Surpassed annual sales targets by achieving 2.5 million Euros in the last year, demonstrating exceptional sales performance and contributing to the company's revenue growth and financial success.✯ Cultivated strategic relationships with renowned designers enhancing the company's brand reputation and positioning as a preferred partner in the industry.

experience.title: Country Manager
experience.description: ✯ Established the Linder Depa office in Mumbai and strategically led a team to secure a high-value contract for ceilings and wall cladding package at Mumbai International Airport, spanning 20,000 square meters and valued at 20 million Euros, resulting in significant revenue generation and market recognition.✯ Successfully secured prestigious projects contributing to the company's reputation and revenue growth in the region.✯ Developed and executed strategic plans to expand the company’s presence in the country, resulting in consistent revenue growth, increased market share, and alignment with evolving trends and customer needs, positioning the company as a key player in the industry.

experience.title: National Sales Manager- India.
experience.description: ✯ Successfully established Visplay as a dominant player in the Indian market through comprehensive market research and strategic relationship-building, resulting in lucrative partnerships with renowned clients, driving significant revenue growth and market expansion.✯ Developed and executed targeted sales action plans, conducting direct sales calls and closely monitoring sales activities to optimize sales opportunities and consistently surpass revenue targets, resulting in impressive sales performance and business success.✯ Elevated the showroom's visibility and appeal to key stakeholders including designers, end clients, and contractors, leading to heightened engagement and increased sales with existing clients, fostering strong brand loyalty and enhancing market presence.✯ Cultivated and maintained strategic relationships with esteemed designers positioning Visplay as the preferred choice for design solutions, facilitating collaboration and driving business growth through innovative design projects and partnerships.

projects: [{"title":"Pop-Up Concept for a Premium Retail Brand with AI Integration.","start_date":"Sep 2024","description":"Design and build of a pop-up concept for a premium retail brand in high-traffic locations such as premium malls and airports. This project involved tackling various challenges like space and time constraints, brand quality expectations, logistics, installation, customer engagement, and regulatory compliance by using AI tools.Key Challenges:1.Space Constraints: 2.Time Constraints: 3.Brand Expectations: 4.Logistics and Installation: 5.Digital Integration: 6.Regulatory Compliance:Leveraging AI as an assistant:In this project we tried to explore how AI could assist in overcoming these challenges and play a transformative role:•Advanced Design Algorithms: AI helped create innovative and brand-aligned designs by learning from specific guidelines and customer preferences.•Sustainability Integration: AI suggested eco-friendly materials and sustainable practices, aligning the design with both luxury and environmental goals.•3D Models & Visual Guides: AI provided detailed 3D models and visual assembly guides-WORK IN PROGRESS•Seamless Digital Integration: Through AI, we ensured smooth communication between digital assets and the physical store layout.•Speed and Efficiency: AI accelerated the design process, enabling rapid prototyping and faster concept-to-market transitions.•Cost Savings: Automating parts of the design reduced labor costs and resource allocation.Opportunities & Future Vision:•Personalization & Sustainability: AI will enable hyper-personalized designs tailored to individual brand identities, optimizing for eco-friendly materials.•Real-Time Adjustments: Future AI capabilities will allow real-time design adjustments based on feedback.In conclusion, this project showcased how AI can turn challenges into opportunities, creating innovative, efficient, and sustainable pop-up retail experiences. The journey is ongoing, and the potential for AI in retail is vast. Assembly is not in sync with design however its possible by Training AI."},{"title":"Dolce & Gabbana- Rollout","start_date":"Sep 2021","end_date":"Jun 2024","description":"Havelock One meticulously handled the manufacturing, supply, and installation of every millwork element within the luxury outlets in Bahrain, UAE, Uzbekistan and South Africa. For the new store concept, our scope included mid-floor fixtures, perimeter fixtures, doors, and wall panels. The materials were to exude luxury, with a gold electroplated metal finish for fixtures and Italian luxury fabrics adorning upholstery and wall panels."},{"title":"Ralph Lauren- Rollout","start_date":"Oct 2019","end_date":"Jun 2024","description":"Since 2019, when we completed our first Ralph Lauren store in Dubai International Airport, we have developed a strong partnership with luxury lifestyle brand.Over the past five years we have delivered the custom manufacturing and fit out for Ralph Lauren projects in Dubai, Abu Dhabi, Qatar, Saudi Arabia, Bahrain and Jordan. Our partnership continues to go from strength to strength as we consistently deliver excellent quality of work and finishing."},{"title":"Jaguar& Land Rover- Rollout","start_date":"May 2015","end_date":"Jun 2018"},{"title":"Best In Retail","start_date":"Apr 2012","end_date":"Apr 2015","description":"Local design agency Brand Creative has completely redesigned the Bin Sina Pharmacy located in Mall of the Emirates.Bin Sina’s new look and feel has achieved widespread success, winning an International Interior Design Association (IIDA) award for the 2013 Middle East Interior Design category."},{},{"title":"Mumbai International Airport- Terminal 2","start_date":"Jun 2010","end_date":"Mar 2012","description":"Supply and installation package for the Metal ceiling (120K sq mtrs ) and Wall cladding with various materials including Aluminimum, Glass, SS, stone etc."},{},{},{},{},{},{"title":"Visual Merchandising Solutions","start_date":"Aug 2007","end_date":"Dec 2010","description":"As a team , we specified and executed some stunning retail projects in India. Right from a Project teams wish, Visual Merchandisers challenge and designers sketch we took over and made sure that the details are well taken care of in execution. We worked with same zeal, confidence and enthusiasm on Fashion boutique, fast fashion, shoe/ hand bags store, accessories store, gaming store to Book store. We worked with almost all major department stores in India."},{},{"title":"Malls and multiplex project with Hardware and electronic security.","start_date":"Aug 2002","end_date":"Mar 2005","description":"We worked as a team from different backgrounds with expertise in individual domain and delivered some exceptional projects with electro mechanical solutions."},{},{},{}]
